price: Dan janganlah harta benda dan anak-anak mereka menarik hatimu.  Sesungguhnya Allah menghendaki akan mengazab mereka di dunia dengan harta dan anak-anak itu dan agar melayang nyawa mereka dalam keadaan kafir.
arabic: وَلَا تُعۡجِبۡكَ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُهُمۡۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tuʿ'jib'ka amwāluhum wa-awlāduhum innamā yurīdu al-lahu an yuʿadhibahum bihā fī al-dun'yā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūna
